mapper.insert: insert into p_article ( title, content, summary,categoryId,metaKeywords,metaDescription, thumbnail,isTop,status,userId,isComment,createTime,`type`,viewCount,commentCount,contentModel, `creator`,payType,previewUrl,docUrl,downloadUrl) VALUES (#{title},#{content}, #{summary},#{categoryId},#{metaKeywords},#{metaDescription}, #{thumbnail},#{isTop},#{status},#{userId},#{isComment},#{createTime},#{type},#{viewCount},#{commentCount}, #{contentModel}, #{creator},#{payType},#{previewUrl},#{docUrl},#{downloadUrl})
mapper.update: ALTER TABLE `p_article` ADD COLUMN `creator` varchar(256) NULL COMMENT '主题/插件创作者' AFTER `slug`, ADD COLUMN `payType` int(0) NULL COMMENT '付费类型0:免费/1:付费' AFTER `creator`, ADD COLUMN `previewUrl` varchar(256) NULL COMMENT '预览地址' AFTER `payType`, ADD COLUMN `docUrl` varchar(256) NULL COMMENT '使用文档地址' AFTER `previewUrl`, ADD COLUMN `downloadUrl` varchar(256) NULL COMMENT '下载地址' AFTER `docUrl`

update p_article set `title` = #{title}, `content` = #{content}, summary = #{summary}, categoryId = #{categoryId}, metaKeywords = #{metaKeywords}, metaDescription = #{metaDescription}, thumbnail = #{thumbnail}, isTop = #{isTop}, isComment = #{isComment}, status = #{status}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, slug=#{slug}, `type`=#{type}, contentModel = #{contentModel}, `creator` = #{creator}, payType = #{payType}, previewUrl = #{previewUrl}, docUrl = #{docUrl}, downloadUrl = #{downloadUrl} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select t1.*,t2.name categoryName,t3.userName,t3.avatar,t3.email,t3.website from p_article t1 left join p_category t2 on t1.categoryId = t2.id left join p_user t3 on t1.userId = t3.id where t1.id = #{id}

select t1.*,t2.name categoryName,t3.userName,t3.avatar,t3.email,t3.website from p_article t1 left join p_category t2 on t1.categoryId = t2.id left join p_user t3 on t1.userId = t3.id where t1.slug = #{slug} and t1.type= #{type}
